column2: BRIEF-Arbor Realty Trust Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock May 16 (Reuters) - Arbor Realty Trust Inc: * ARBOR REALTY TRUST ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * ARBOR REALTY TRUST INC - PRICED OFFERING OF 5.5 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK FOR TOTAL EXPECTED GROSS PROCEEDS OF ABOUT $48.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Arbor Realty Trust Announces Public Offering Of Common Stock May 15 (Reuters) - Arbor Realty Trust Inc: * ARBOR REALTY TRUST, INC. ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * SAYS OFFERING 5.50 MILLION COMMON SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Arbor Realty Trust, Inc. Announces Pricing Of Senior Notes Due 2023 May 10 (Reuters) - Arbor Realty Trust Inc: * ARBOR REALTY TRUST, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023 * ARBOR REALTY TRUST - PRICING OF $25 MILLION OF ITS 5.625% SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES DUE MAY 1, 2023 AT 99.445% OF PAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Arbor Realty Trust Q1 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.25 May 4 (Reuters) - Arbor Realty Trust Inc: * ARBOR REALTY TRUST REPORTS FIRST QUARTER RESULTS AND INCREASES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND 19% TO $0.25 PER SHARE * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $18.2 MILLION VERSUS $14.1 MILLION * QTRLY REPORTED NET INCOME $0.42 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
